original_text: Moses gave the part that was for the Lord to Eleazar, the priest. He would offer these to the Lord, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 여호와께 거제의 공물로 드린 것을 모세가 제사장 엘르아살에게 주었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하심과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: Moses gave the part that was for the Lord
He would offer these to the Lord,
as the Lord had commanded Moses.
